trends: There have been 127 other sightings in San Francisco
There were no other sightings in San Francisco on or around August 3rd 2007
Summary: The ufo was 7 in shape with 4 dots which looked like 4 birds.
divs: Sighting DetailsHi this is to inform that i saw a UFO.. 3rd august 2007 me and my 2 uncles were in the backyard.. one of my uncle was smoking.I started talking about how old stars are and how long their lights take to reach the earth.i also showed them saturn. it was almost 9 pm. suddenly something like flock of 4 birds appeaerd.at first i thought it was birds but its was glowing dim.i showed my uncles at once. they thought it was aeroplane but it was too near.it was so fast that it dissepared so quickly.it was like 7 in shape.and we didnt know what it was.... it was a mystery.. if u say it was bird it was glowing and if u say aeroplane it was too near... it was so fast that u cant imagine.. it came all the way from the otherside and dissapered in about 5 seconds.I live in san francisco and it all happend here... me , and my uncles were the only one to see it'
